title: Font recommendations for back of sailboat "Esprit"
content:
Any recommendations for a font that will be vinyl lettered on the back of a sailboat. The sailboat name is Esprit and we are looking for a font that “captures” this name below. The definition of esprit is liveliness of mind or spirit; sprightliness.

The fonts that we are considering are:

Jeffriana  
Marmalade  
Mr. De Haviland  
Valentina Joy  
Ministry Script  
LoveLight  
UpDock  
Sarah Script

Thanks for any help that you can offer!

 [‹ My new logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709012802/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40775 "Go to previous forum topic") [Name this Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709012802/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41006 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jjdewtt

comments.content:
How about [ITC Esprit](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709012802/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-esprit/medium-italic/)!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709012802im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Esprit_ital.png)

Just kidding! :-)

In all honesty, why search for a “font”.  
It’s a “one-off” to be cut in vinyl, so why not have a custom logo?  
So much more impressive than straight typesetting for a boat’s name.

Thanks for the Esprit recommendation. :)  
We’ll probably create a customized logo from one of these fonts.  
Thanks again.

Josh
What kind of sailboat is it? Do you have an image?

Thanks for the input, everyone. Jan, I don’t know the specifics yet as to what kind of sailboat it is. I’m waiting for a picture from my client and will upload it here when I receive it. Thanks again.

Well it looks like you are really found that boat, who wouldn’t be. I can’t afford to dream about a bout of my own although I am passioned about them. That explains why [barge holidays](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709012802/http:/www.hireacanalboat.co.uk/introduction.html) are on top of my preferences. If I where you, I would keep the font simple.
